description: In a move that underscores Egypt’s dedication to fostering cooperation with African nations, the Central Bank of Egypt (CBE) recently hosted a delegation from the Central Bank of Kenya (CBK). This visit was part of a broader initiative to share Egypt’s pioneering efforts in developing the Instant Payment Network (IPN) and the InstaPay application. The […]
title: CBE welcomes Kenyan delegation to discuss instant payment innovations

description: CBE’s inclusion in Network for Greening Financial System: Testament to banking sector’s role in fostering green economy
title: Advancements in ESG standards integration within banking sector: CBE’s Sub Governor

description: Banknbox Egypt, a leading digital services and payment technology provider, has announced strategic partnerships with banks and fintech firms in eight countries during the first half of 2024. This expansion aims to solidify Banknbox’s position as a regional hub for financial and banking services, leveraging Egypt’s growing fintech sector. With support from the Central […]
title: Central Bank of Egypt-backed Banknbox expands fintech partnerships across 8 countries in H1 2024

description: €271m EIB funding to propel new Industrial Pollution Control Programme phase: Minister Fouad
title: Environment Minister discusses private sector’s role in advancing Egypt’s industrial environmental integration

description: The Chemical and Fertilizers Export Council (CEC) of Egypt has formally submitted six key proposals to Prime Minister Mostafa Madbouly. The proposals include critical measures such as ensuring a consistent gas supply for fertilizer and petrochemical plants and expediting the Value-Added Tax (VAT) refund process for exporters. Khaled Abul Makarem, Chairperson of the CEC, highlighted […]
title: CEC submits six proposals to Prime Minister for economic enhancement

description: Shehata, Houngbo discuss labour conditions in Palestine, Egypt's reforms, and future cooperation
title: Egypt’s Labour Minister concludes ILO Conference with meeting with Director-General

description: Egypt’s Minister of Agriculture and Land Reclamation, Elsayed Elkosayer, has pledged to provide support and cooperation to The Gambia in the field of aquaculture. The commitment was made during a meeting with Musa Drammeh, The Gambia’s Minister of Fisheries and Water Resources, in Cairo. Elkosayer highlighted Egypt’s recent success in aquaculture, stating, “Egypt has […]
title: Egypt pledges aquaculture support to The Gambia

description: Finance Minister Mohamed Maait has reaffirmed the government’s dedication to comprehensive economic reforms aimed at confronting both domestic and international obstacles. These challenges have been magnified by a series of global and regional upheavals, further intensified by the COVID-19 pandemic’s aftermath, the conflict in Ukraine, rising tensions in Gaza, and instability in the Red Sea […]
title: Egypt launches major initiatives to enhance business environment, propel private sector development: Finance Minister

description: Egypt’s National Food Safety Authority (NFSA) and the Democratic Republic of the Congo’s (DRC) Food and Drug Administration (FDA) have signed a cooperation protocol to enhance food safety control and trade between the two nations. The agreement, signed by NFSA Head Tarek El Houby and FDA Director General Christian Ntomba, aims to strengthen coordination […]
title: Egypt’s NFSA, DRC’s FDA ink food safety agreement

description: Egypt’s Minister of Social Solidarity, Nevine El-Kabbaj, met with her Sudanese counterpart, Ahmed Adam Bakhit, at the Ministry of Social Solidarity in the New Administrative Capital on Saturday. Egyptian Minister of Social Solidarity Nevine El-Kabbaj met with Sudanese Minister of Social Development Ahmed Adam Bakhit in the New Administrative Capital on Saturday to discuss […]
title: Egypt pledges continued support for Sudan amidst ongoing crisis

description: Egypt’s President Abdel Fattah Al-Sisi and Azerbaijan’s President Ilham Aliyev stressed the need for a ceasefire in Gaza during a joint press conference on Saturday in Cairo.   President Al-Sisi highlighted Egypt’s humanitarian efforts in Gaza and the pursuit of a ceasefire to facilitate the establishment of a sovereign Palestinian state, as defined by the […]
title: Egypt’s Al-Sisi, Azerbaijan’s Aliyev advocate for ceasefire in Gaza

description: Egypt strongly condemns Israeli massacre in Al-Nuseirat as 'blatant violation of international law and human rights'
title: ‘Israeli-American’ operation to liberate 4 Israeli hostages brings about 210 civilian casualties in Gaza

description: Egypt’s Minister of Planning and Economic Development, Hala El-Said, and Russian Minister of Economic Development, Maxim Reshetnikov, met on the sidelines of the 27th St. Petersburg International Economic Forum (SPIEF) to discuss potential areas of cooperation. El-Said emphasized the long-standing relationship between Egypt and Russia and the opportunity the meeting presented to strengthen bilateral ties. […]
title: Egypt’s El-Said, Russia’s Reshetnikov discuss economic cooperation at SPIEF

description: Egypt will host the first seminar of the New Development Bank (NDB) outside of the founding BRICS nations (Brazil, Russia, India, China, and South Africa) on June 11th and 12th. The event, held under the patronage of President Abdel Fattah Al-Sisi, is co-organized by the Egyptian Ministry of International Cooperation and the NDB, following […]
title: Egypt to host 1st New Development Bank seminar outside founding BRICS nations
